Race.SpecificTitle: Associate Justice -- Supreme Court, 4th Supreme Court District
Eunice GDD No. 9 -- 3.57 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Eunice Gravity Drainage District No. 9 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 3.57 mills property tax renewal for constructing, improving, maintaining and operating gravity drainage works within and for the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Eunice Gravity Drainage District No. 9 of the Parishes of St. Landry and Evangeline, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of three and fifty-seven hundredths (3.57) mills on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $44,750 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2011 and ending with the year 2020, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating drainage works within and for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Twin Parish Port District -- 4 Mills- Twin Parish Port Commission- 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Twin Parish Port District Proposition

Summary:  10-Year 4 mills property tax for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating an industrial park, waterfront development, and community redevelopment projects throughout the Twin Parish Port District; and a 10-Year 1 mill property tax to provide for the general fund of the Twin Parish Port District.
Race.FullText: Shall the Twin Parish Port District of the Parishes of Iberia and Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a tax of four (4) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating an industrial park, waterfront developments, and community redevelopment projects throughout the District with an estimated annual revenue for non-general purposes of $85,573.10 from Iberia Parish and $157,017.60 from Vermillion Parish, and a 10-Year 1 mill property tax, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, to provide for the general fund of the Twin Parish Port District with an estimated annual revenue of $21,393.27 from Iberia Parish and $39,254.40 from Vermilion Parish?
